casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eddie Lamar TAYLOR. No. 719A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 24, 2007. Daniel Shatz, Anne M. Gomez, Assistant Appellate Defenders, for Taylor. William Crumpler, Assistant Attorney General, Susan Doyle, District Attorney, Daniel P. O'Brien, Raleigh, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of August 2007 by Defendant to Amend Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of September 2007."
